lesson.title: Additional Optimization Topics
lesson.summary: Review similarities of the techniques introduced in this lesson with links to readings on advanced optimization topics, then complete an optimization exercise in the classroom.

atoms.text:
## General
- [Derivative Free Optimization](http://thales.cheme.cmu.edu/dfo/comparison/dfo.pdf) or [Gradient Free Optimization](http://adl.stanford.edu/aa222/lecture_notes_files/chapter6_gradfree.pdf)
- For another viewpoint and some extensions, check out Charles Isbell and Michael Littmanâ€™s Machine Learning course section on this topic: [Randomized Optimization](https://classroom.udacity.com/courses/ud741/lessons/521298714/concepts/5344086080923)
- [Late Acceptance Hill Climbing](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/abs/pii/S0377221716305495)
  - [Applied](https://wiwi.uni-paderborn.de/fileadmin/dep3ls7/Downloads/Publikationen/PDFs/lahc-lsfrp-eume2013.pdf)
- [Basin hopping](https://arxiv.org/pdf/cond-mat/0402136.pdf)
- [Neuroevolution](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.00548.pdf) (Genetic algorithms)
- [NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies (NEAT)](http://nn.cs.utexas.edu/?neat)

## Gradient-Free Optimization Algorithms
- [Tabu search](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tabu_search)
- [differential evolution](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Differential_evolution)
- [evolutionary strategies](https://arxiv.org/pdf/1703.03864.pdf)
- [particle swarm optimization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Particle_swarm_optimization)

## Gradient-Based Optimization Algorithms
- [Gradient Descent](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gradient_descent)
- [quasi-Newtonian methods](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Quasi-Newton_method)
- [Levenburg-Marquardt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Levenberg%E2%80%93Marquardt_algorithm)
